isosensitivity: Auto (100-25600), 100-25600 (in 1/3-stop or whole stop increments) ISO can be expanded to L: 50, H1: 51200, H2: 102400 During Movie shooting: Auto (100-12800), 100-12800 (in 1/3-stop or whole stop increments) ISO can be expanded to H: 25600
screenfeatures: - Resolution: 1040K dots - 170° wide-angle viewing - Adjustable brightness - Dual Anti-reflection coating - Approx. 100% frame coverage
shutterspeed: 30-1/4000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
